panels.content:
BlueCompute CASE/CSMO
BlueCompute logs | New Relic Service Map

targets.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "service_status" WITH KEY = "regionname" where "name" =~ /^$AppName$/
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "service_status" WITH KEY = "language" where "name" =~ /^$AppName$/
select last(status_num) from bmx_app_status where cf_name =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
select last(highest_sev) from noi_app_severity where app_name =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
select running_instances from bmx_app_status where cf_name =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("response_time") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("error_rate") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("apdex_score") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("apdex_target") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$AppName$/ and $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "service_status" WITH KEY = "regionname" where "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "service_status" WITH KEY = "language" where "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/
SELECT last("status") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
select last(highest_sev) from noi_app_severity where app_name =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("response_time") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("error_rate") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("apdex_score") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("apdex_target") FROM "service_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$ContainerAppName$/ and $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "container_status" WITH KEY = "regionname" where "ic_group" =~ /^$ContainerGroupName$/
select last(group_status) from container_status where ic_group =~ /^$ContainerGroupName$/ and $timeFilter group by ic_group
select last(highest_sev) from noi_app_severity where app_name =~  /^$ContainerGroupName$/ and $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM container_status WITH KEY = "type" where "ic_group" =~ /^$ContainerGroupName$/
SELECT max(inst_index) from container_status where ic_group =~ /^$ContainerGroupName$/
select status from container_status where ic_group =~ /^$ContainerGroupName$/ and $timeFilter group by ic_name order by time desc limit 1
SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mysql_status" WITH KEY = "regionname" where "name" =~ /^$MySQLName$/
select last(highest_sev) from noi_app_severity where app_name =~  /^$ContainerGroupName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("reads") FROM "mysql_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$MySQLName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("writes") FROM "mysql_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$MySQLName$/ and $timeFilter
SELECT last("connections") FROM "mysql_status" WHERE "name" =~ /^$MySQLName$/ and $timeFilter

list.label: App Name
list.name: AppName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "name" where apptype = 'cf_app'
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "name" where "servicename" = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "servicename"

list.label: Container Groups
list.name: ContainerGroupName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM container_status WITH KEY = ic_group where apptype = 'container'
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM container_status WITH KEY = "ic_group" where servicename = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM container_status WITH KEY = "servicename"

list.label: MySQL instances
list.name: MySQLName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mysql_status WITH KEY = "name"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mysql_status WITH KEY = "name" where servicename = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM mysql_status WITH KEY = "servicename"

list.label: Container App Name
list.name: ContainerAppName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "name" where apptype = 'container_app'
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "name" where "servicename" = '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM service_status WITH KEY = "servicename"
